mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( sub, etc, division, requestDate, insertDt, updateDt, writerId, uId, manager, managerId, managerTel, managerEmail ) VALUES ( #{sub, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{division, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), GETDATE(), #{writerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select seq, sub, context, taskName, help, necessity, effect, module, beforeTaskContent, afterTaskContent, useDept, attachDoc, requestDate, acceptDate, completeRequestDate, completeDate, etc, uId, usem, dpId, dpDn, manager, managerId, managerTel, managerEmail, division, processState, saveFlag, srFlag, docNum, insertDt, updateDt, completeDt from board;

select seq, sub, context, taskName, help, necessity, effect, module, beforeTaskContent, afterTaskContent, useDept, attachDoc, requestDate, acceptDate, completeRequestDate, completeDate, etc, uId, writerId, usem, dpId, dpDn, manager, managerId, managerTel, managerEmail, division, processState, saveFlag, srFlag, docNum, insertDt, updateDt, completeDt from board where seq = #{seq};
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET sub = #{sub}, etc = #{etc}, manager = #{manager}, managerId = #{managerId}, managerEmail = #{managerEmail}, managerTel = #{managerTel}, saveFlag = 'Y' WHERE seq = #{seq};

UPDATE board SET sub = #{sub}, taskName = #{taskName}, help = #{help}, necessity = #{necessity}, effect = #{effect}, module = #{module}, beforeTaskContent = #{beforeTaskContent}, afterTaskContent = #{afterTaskContent}, useDept = #{useDept}, attachDoc = #{attachDoc}, requestDate = #{requestDate}, acceptDate = #{acceptDate}, completeRequestDate = #{completeRequestDate}, completeDate = #{completeDate}, saveFlag = 'Y', etc = #{etc} WHERE seq = #{seq};
